data.name: Notice me, Leena-senpai!
data.detailed_description:
Pre-purchase now on Kickstarter!
http://kck.st/3t38ESN

Demo Available on itch.io!
https://gamedevtosh.itch.io/notice-me-leena-senpai-demo

About the Game

"Notice me Leena-senpai" is a visual novel tower defense game with lots of cute characters, each with backstories and important roles in the games main story.

Assist Leena and her friends in a war against the Demon Lords army in a fast paced combat system whilst indulging in deep rooted character engaged campaign mode. Unlock new areas, towers, and levels as you progress as well as special game modes to maximize the fun!


Adorable Characters
- Animated anime girls are defending your school from a hoards of enemies!
- Unlock new characters as you play and experience stories amidst the chaos
- Additional, optional side stories about the characters become available while playing

Endless Modes!
- Compete on Steam leaderboards for the highest score throughout multiple maps!
- Ranging difficulty in maps and several towers encourages many different play styles
- Play anywhere! Single player offline keeps you gaming when your wifi bars aren't adding up!

data.short_description: Oh no! The Demon Lord is attacking! Help Leena-senpai defend her town against a horde of demon lord goons!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 5 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
